# instatus Provider

Interact with Instatus.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "instatus" {
  api_key = "YOUR_API_KEY"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) API Key for Instatus API. May also be provided via INSTATUS_APIKEY environment variable.
